findings.details: Added form-level aria label/description to contact form for clearer screen reader context.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Default layout includes SEO tags, keywords fallback, hreflang, and social image alt metadata.
Contact page copy provides clear expectations and response time.

recommendations: Consider adding explicit aria-describedby on newsletter forms for extra context.
Run a live link check when network access is available.
